comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC: The second name should be "Beauclerc".

comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content:
The date is faint but appears to be 7/14/14.

Could this be Theo Beauclerc Rogers 2nd, not 3rd?  In 1914 the New York Tribune was reporting on the divorce proceedings between Josephine Pyle Rogers and Theo Beauclerc Rogers.  The reports refer to their young son as Theo Beauclerc Rogers 2nd.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thank you for your comments.  We will update the catalog record.
